sentences.english: The effects of tea fungus on the browning of fresh-cut potato were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究紅茶菌液對鮮切馬鈴薯褐變的影響。

sentences.english: We shall place a trial order with you for 80 cases of Black Tea if your price is workable.
sentences.chinese: 假如你方價格可行，我們將向你方試購80箱紅茶。

sentences.english: The black tea tastes strong and promotes digestion.
sentences.chinese: 紅茶茶味濃郁，有助消化。

sentences.english: The herdsmen like to eat beef , mutton and dairy products, and drink black tea and brick tea .
sentences.chinese: 牧民們喜歡喫牛羊肉和奶製品，喜歡喝紅茶和磚茶。

sentences.english: Black teas are graded by leaf size and by where they are grown.
sentences.chinese: 紅茶由葉大小進行分級，由他們在哪裏長大。

sentences.english: Order black tea instead of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 叫杯紅茶喝來代替咖啡。

sentences.english: Many bubble tea houses have sprung up during the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年中許多的泡沫紅茶店迅速的出現。

sentences.english: And one of the best ways to get them?
sentences.chinese: 得到它們的最好方法之一是喝紅茶。

sentences.english: Andean countries, also known as "black country."
sentences.chinese: 斯國也被稱爲“紅茶之國”。

sentences.english: Fall in love while sipping a cup of tea…
sentences.chinese: 先生，我要一杯冰紅茶，要綠色的。

sentences.english: The Acetobacter xylinum and Schizosacchromyces sp. were isolated from tea fungus culture.
sentences.chinese: 從紅茶菌液中分離得到膜醋酸菌與裂殖酵母。

sentences.english: Black tea contains plenty of tea polyphenols, so it helps to strengthen the bones and can stave osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 紅茶因多酚類含量高，可以強健骨骼，延緩骨質疏鬆。

sentences.english: Now, a new study has shown that black tea could help prevent cancer.
sentences.chinese: 現在，一項新研究顯示，紅茶可能有助於防癌。

sentences.english: Because of the shorter processing time the green tea has a lighter flavor than the black tea.
sentences.chinese: 因爲加工過程時間短，綠茶的味道比紅茶更清淡。

sentences.english: He only drank a cup of black tea and nibbled at a piece of dry bread for his supper.
sentences.chinese: 他在晚餐上只喝了一杯紅茶，啃了一片乾麪包。

sentences.english: Between green tea and black tea, belonging to the semi-fermented tea.
sentences.chinese: 介於綠茶和紅茶之間，屬於半發酵茶類。

definition: Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
